LanguageData.Bullet_BallisticCombatGun.label: assault bullet
LanguageData.Bullet_BallisticEnforcer.label: enforcer bullet
LanguageData.Bullet_BallisticShredder.label: heavy shredder
LanguageData.CW_BallisticCombatGun.label: ballistic combat gun
LanguageData.CW_BallisticCombatGun.description: A general-purpose gas-operated assault rifle for field or urban combat. Designed for large calibre cartridges. The case covers a complex burst engine inside. More power, faster handling, better accuracy.
LanguageData.CW_BallisticCombatGun.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.CW_BallisticCombatGun.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.CW_BallisticEnforcer.label: ballistic enforcer
LanguageData.CW_BallisticEnforcer.description: An energy assisted assault rifle for field operations. This version is integrated with a computing system to increase its firepower and accuracy. The infused projectiles are fired in small bursts to prevent overheating. Usually fabricated by machines and hard to assemble for a human being.
LanguageData.CW_BallisticEnforcer.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.CW_BallisticEnforcer.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.CW_BallisticShredder.label: ballistic shredder
LanguageData.CW_BallisticShredder.description: A compact, wide-caliber slug-thrower. It's got a very short range, but it packs a punch and handles quite well. Comes with a larger magazine and lesser outbreaks due to an implemented stabilizer.
LanguageData.CW_BallisticShredder.tools.grip.label: grip
LanguageData.CW_BallisticShredder.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.CW_RiotBreaker.label: riot breaker
LanguageData.CW_RiotBreaker.description: A charge rifle modified to be a magazine-fed fully automatic shotgun with recoil absorber. Packs a huge magazine and is extraordinarily powerful due to burst fire on short distance. Produced for maximum security Jailplanets with very dangerous subjects.
LanguageData.CW_RiotBreaker.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.CW_RiotBreaker.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.CW_RiotBreaker.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: riot breaker
